content: Are we clear about the process for handling tasks that are not ballot tasks, that propose substantiative changes in normative candidates?
No. If it's necessary, we'll have to engage with Lynn/Karen to find out what the rules are
well, I think it needs to be clear, since committees are already doing this
Why would they be doing it outside of ballot when the ballot is open?
existing tasks? people creating tasks and not submitting ballot items
Anything submitted prior to ballot close could have one of us submit a covering ballot comment. However, I've initiated the discussion w/ Karen & Lynn
